  • Constructor Details

    • Tower

      public Tower​(GameArena panel)
      This constructor creates an item to show tower. Sets height and width of tower.
      Parameters:
      panel - Display tower in the panel.

  • Method Details

    • towerHP

      public void towerHP​(float towerHP)
      This method sets tower's health.
      Parameters:
      towerHP - Tower's health.

    • getHp

      public float getHp()
      This method gets tower's health.
      Returns:
      Return the health of tower.

    • towerAttacked

      public void towerAttacked​(GameArena panel)
      This method shows the attack of tower. When tower is attacked, change tower's image and reduce health by 5.
      Parameters:
      panel - Display the attack effect in the panel.
